title: How to become a grant writer - Quora

response.answer_text: Generally, the way to become a grant writer is to work as a volunteer grant writer for a while, getting some experience and also a track record as a grant writer who has been funded. How long that will take depends on how much you put into it. I know from personal experience that it can be done. Good luck.

You need to read a lot of literature in different fields, to be aware of many life things. And of course, you need to write a lot, better to write your own opinion and feelings about new thing you’ve read or saw, try to use new approaches in your writing, maybe you should try a new writing app such as wri.tt.
